testcase.classname: Check if new users can be registered
testcase.name: Simple user registration
testcase.system-out: Given User registered with details Ravi, Kalla, 1111111111, ravi@ravi.com, ravi and ravi.passed When User logged in after registration with ravi and ravi...................passed Then Check if user details Ravi, Kalla, 1111111111, ravi@ravi.com, ravi and ravi are properly stored in DB.passed
